Module guigame
Package guigame.logic.objects

Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
guigame.logic.objects.GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
UserPaddle
public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract for a GameObject in the logic. Each GameObject has a specific height, width and position as well as a bunch of setters and getters.
